parameter.name: N
parameter.comment: number of aircraft in the system

parameter.name: vmin
parameter.comment: v_min lower bound on rectangular dynamics

parameter.name: vmax
parameter.comment: v_max upper bound on rectangular dynamics

variable.name: last
variable.comment: global tail pointer variable, where tail is defined as the plane that is last to land

assumption.comment: there are at least 2 aircraft in the system

action.equn: x[i]' = 0.0 and next[i]' = last and last' = i

guard.equn: (next[i] == 0) or (next[i] != 0 and q[ next[i] ] == Base and x[ next[i] ] >= (LGUARD * 1.0))
x[i] >= LB and next[i] == 0 and last != i

action.equn: x[i]' = 0.0 and next[i]' = last and last' = i

guard.equn: x[i] >= LB and next[i] == 0 and last == i

action.equn: x[i]' = 0.0 and next[i]' = 0 and last' = i

guard.equn: x[i] >= LB and next[i] == 0 and last == i
x[i] >= LB and next[i] == 0 and last != i

action.equn: x[i]' = 0.0 and next[i]' = 0 and last' = last

property.comment: key lemma 3: must hold to show key lemma 2

property.equn: forall i j ((next[j] == i) implies (q[i] != Fly))
property.comment: key lemma 2: must hold to show key lemma 1

property.equn: forall i j ((q[i] = Holding and next[j] = i) implies (q[j] = Holding))
property.comment: key lemma 1: for showing safety (if this holds, safety holds)

property.equn: forall i j ((q[i] == Base and q[j] == Base and next[j] == i) implies (x[i] >= (vmax - vmin) * (LB - x[j]) / (vmin) ))
forall i j ((q[i] == Base and q[j] == Base and next[j] == i) implies (x[i] >= LS + (vmax - vmin) * (LB - x[j]) / (vmin) ))
forall i j ((i != j and q[i] == Base and q[j] == Base and next[j] == i) implies (x[i] - x[j] >= LS))
property.comment: Safety: there is always at least S distance between any two distinct aircraft.
